contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update xm_notes set contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, potentialid = #{potentialid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notetype = #{notetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_date = #{contactDate,jdbcType=DATE}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectsid = #{projectsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, next_contact_date = #{nextContactDate,jdbcType=DATE}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_stage = #{salesStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latest_comments_time = #{latestCommentsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where notesid = #{notesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_notes LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_account.accountid = xm_notes.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_contactdetails ON xm_contactdetails.contactid = xm_notes.contact_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xm_potential ON xm_potential.potentialid = xm_notes.potentialid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_notes.smownerid WHERE xm_notes.deleted = 0 and 1=1 ${filter}

select xm_notes.title,xm_users.user_name FROM xm_notes LEFT JOIN xm_account ON xm_account.accountid = xm_notes.accountid LEFT JOIN xm_contactdetails ON xm_contactdetails.contactid = xm_notes.contact_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xm_potential ON xm_potential.potentialid = xm_notes.potentialid LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_notes.smownerid WHERE xm_notes.deleted = 0 and 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}
